rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment uses factual language without high-potency verbs or metaphors.
The segment does not contain a moderate verb paired with explicit scale or impact.
Segment does not contain a question.
The segment reports factual findings without explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a minimiser used in conjunction with a scale contrast.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
The segment reports case details/links, not capabilities or preparedness.
'Six of the 16 reported human cases have been linked' reports a numerical metric (cases) factually.
